mapper.select: SELECT t1.*, t2.*, t3.*, t4.*, t5.* FROM entity_one t1 INNER JOIN entity_two t2 ON t2.id_entity_two = t1.id_entity_two INNER JOIN entity_tree t3 ON t3.id_entity_tree = t2.id_entity_tree INNER JOIN entity_four t4 ON t4.id_entity_four = t3.id_entity_four INNER JOIN entity_five t5 ON t5.id_entity_five = t4.id_entity_five WHERE t1.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') ORDER BY name DESC
